infos.title: Blizzard's Sniper
infos.like: Bears, polar bears, grizzly bears, small bears, large bears
infos.dislike: Those who do not value live
infos.story: The empire's top ranking sniper, and a lover of bears. She likes them so much that she always wears accessories resembling a bear's ears on her hat. So, she'll sometimes hunts tigers, but she'll never shoot a bear. Although her shooting skills are most suitable for assassination, she swore to never use them for unjust reasons. Instead, she uses them to protect others. Currently, she lives with Pavel in the Windland Snow Mountain as his personal guard delegated by the empire.

uw.name: Rodina Custom Rifle Mod.0
uw.description: Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing (0) of ATK as extra P.DMG and knocking back the enemy. Afterwards, ACC is increased by 100 for 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times max.
uw.story: The essence of the most sophisticated imperial technology. Requiring superhuman precision, this rifle cannot be handled by a regular person. It has been magically enchanted to allow the shooter to see impossibly long distances. Even the greatest scope in the world, however, is useless in the hands of someone who can't aim with it. As such, the performance of this rifle has significantly depended on the skills of its users. Rodina, gifted with superb vision and precise control, is a suitable owner of this rifle. She went one step further and customized it to her preference, naming it Rodina Custom.

4.name: Gun Encyclopedia

4.story: A magazine about firearms being issued in the Empire. Issued regularly by Magos Le'Flamme, this firearms encyclopedia is Rodina's favorite magazine that contains various information about cutting-edge guns and weapons. Rodina has more faith in this magazine than she does for other magazines because it is edited under the supervision of Chief Director Valance, who Rodina is a big fan of.

sw.story:
Mod.0 is the most eleborate rifle that the empire has ever created. Among the snipers, Rodina has proven her skills as the ace sniper through the excellent use of the rifle. However, even Rodina misses her shots sometimes.
That is because to successfully hit the target, one does not only need a good sniper and a good weapon, but also other aspects such as good environmental condition, and good calculation.
One can expect success only when 'the best condition' has been set through the combination of various factors. Also even then, there is also many uncontrollable odds involved, such as luck.
Rodina did not deny such, and she did not give up. Rodina decided to focus on factors she could control, and improve her skills to the max. Thus, she went to a snow mountain to improve her concentration. A snow mountain was considered the best place to hone concentration, as it requires extreme concentration to hit a moving target through falling snow, and sight-impairing mist of the snow mountain. Rodina continued honing her skills to meet the goal of her training.
Then one day, Rodina found herself being wrapped by a strange sensation. Even though her sight was impaired due to fatigue, she could somehow see the target clearly.
She pulled the trigger instinctively, and that's when Rodina detected a crosshair that had appeared in front of the rifle. It was the rifle's gift to its master who had completed her herculean training.
